snippet.title: Mayhem Brawler - 3 Player Gameplay (Closed Beta)
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1306720/Mayhem_Brawler/
Wishlist on Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10002637

First-ever recorded footage of Mayhem Brawler 3 player test! Don't forget this footage is still from the closed beta build. There are visible bugs in the video and we are aware of them, also the playable character Dolphin's animations are still being developed. We are releasing the footage in high demand so you can watch it now. We had so much fun during the playtest, you will have fun playing it too! 
- Your friendly neighborhood superhero developers.

© Hero Concept. All Rights Reserved.

Mayhem Brawler is an urban fantasy themed beat ’em up that brings back the 90s arcade vibe to the present day. With comic book style art and kick-ass soundtracks, it offers a unique experience that you can tackle solo or as co-op with friends while defining the next step in the story with your choices.

Join Our Discord Server: https://discord.com/invite/6QV3PXrsf7
Follow us on;
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HeroConcept
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/heroconcept
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/heroconceptgames/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/HeroConcept
Imgur: https://imgur.com/user/heroconceptgames/
